Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Near Oakland, Bloomfield, and the Strip District.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: In the heart of Lawrenceville. Ideal for a centrally located retail, distribution, R&D or showroom operation.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Beautiful, clean warehouse space within the heart of robotics row

Common.SubdivisionName.Common.Text: EIC - Building I is Under Construction

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text:
New Construction; Tech/Flex Space in Pittsburgh Technology Center
Ground Breaking - March 2021
Delivery - April 2022
New Construction; Tech/Flex Space in Pittsburgh Technology Center

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located within the high-profile Pittsburgh Technology Center campus positioned between Downtown Pittsburgh and the Universities in the Innovation Corridor

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
ELMHURST INNOVATION CENTER 
• 160,000± SF campus consisting of two 80,000± SF buildings
• Combining creative, dynamic office and open flex space with modern high-bay suites
• Best-in-class warehouse and shop design with loading and clear heights designed for tech and R&D focused tenants
• Building design offers high-quality materials with the mixing of metals, wood and brick, a state of the art translucent wall, efficient space planning, riverfront views, and modern amenities
• Building 1 broke ground in March 2021. It is currently under construction and will deliver in April 2022.

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: 44,000 SF +/- of single flex building designed for both 100% office and as an office/warehouse mix
Building is being speculatively constructed with planned delivery date in 1Q 2021
Unique wing shaped design provides for efficient layout, easy loading capability, and ample natural light
Ability to subdivide suites as small as 3,000 SF
Access to 100 Beecham and its amenity spaces including fitness, cantina with food/beverage space, tenant lounge, soft seating, and an outdoor area
Developed by Horizon Properties Group with over 30 years' experience owning, developing, and managing over 3 million square feet of commercial property in Pittsburgh

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Strategically located of I-79 and Rt. 60 interchanges with immediate accessibility

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: New development single story flex office building with ample parking and access to numerous amenities at 100 Beecham including fitness, cantina, tenant lounge, and outdoor patio spaces.
